column4: hi. i was told this was the channel i should visit. ive tested ubuntu and xubuntu via live disks ive burned. ive never used linux before. out of the two which one would you say is easier for a linux new-comer like myself to use? i was told this was a good place to ask.
ah i see. ok. nother' question. which one is more customizable?
and if i want to learn everything to learn about linux, i take it ubuntu would be best choice.
I would say you should go for Ubuntu because it is best supported
